channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI hires Meta's former Orion head to lead its robotics efforts
item.description: The former head of Meta's augmented reality glasses initiative has joined OpenAI to lead the startup's robotics and consumer hardware efforts.

item.title: Meta extends ban on new political ads past Election Day
item.description: Meta extends restriction period for new political ads throughout the week of the U.S. elections.

item.title: What the stock market typically does after the U.S. election, according to history
item.description: Stocks typically rise after a presidential election, but investors need to be prepared for some short-term choppiness first, history shows.

item.title: As Americans head to the polls, social media companies are in the spotlight
item.description: Social media companies are under intense pressure to squash the spread of disinformation on their platforms during the 2024 elections

item.title: Nintendo profit plunges 69% as it cuts forecast for sales of ageing Switch console
item.description: Investors are waiting for news surrounding a successor to the Switch which they hope will re-energize Nintendo's gaming business.

item.title: The U.S. election is a make-or-break moment for aid to Ukraine
item.description: Ukrainian officials are likely watching U.S. polls with more than a touch of nervousness this week, as the vote remains too close to call.

item.title: Stocks rise, Dow gains 300 points as Wall Street awaits U.S. presidential election results: Live updates
item.description: The S&P 500 rose Tuesday as traders awaited the results from a high-stakes U.S. presidential election.

item.description: Amazon says it has received approval from the FAA to fly its newer, smaller delivery drones, including beyond the visual line of sight of pilots.

item.description: The IRS rule starting in 2025 allows people ages 60 to 63 to add $11,250 extra to their 401(k).

item.title: Coinbase's big election bet is about to be tested
item.description: Coinbase emerged as a top corporate donor this election cycle, backing candidates the company viewed as supporting its pro-crypto agenga.
